articles.title: Alexi Laiho brought light to the dark of death metal - The Guardian
articles.description: The Children of Bodom frontman, who has died aged 41, used virtuosity, neoclassical melody and flashy rock star charisma to invigorate and popularise extreme music
articles.content: Death metal was never supposed to be fun. Pioneered in Sweden and the US by bands such as Death and Grave, it was a niche built around abrasive noise, with chainsaw-like guitar tones, relentless scre… [+4541 chars]
